name: IKFixes
author: NotAKidoS
description:
A few small fixes to IK. Major ones are listed below:

**FBT** - Fixes knee tracking & running animations.

**Halfbody** - Fixes footsteps while on a MovementParent & uses root angle offset to prevent feet from only pointing in head direction.
changelog:
- Initial Release
- Added FakeRootAngle fix for Halfbody. Feet will no longer only point in the direction of head while looking around/turning. This can be disabled in mod settings.
